A thin wrapper for java.util.ArrayList<Action> that does not allow nulls to be added.

The Actor class represents a GameEntity that can perform an Action.

FruitTree serves as the base for trees that produce fruits

Base class for all objects that can exist in the game.

Class representing one map within the system.

GroundFactory
Interface for factory classes used by GameMap to create new map locations.
HostileActor
Represents a hostile actor in the game world that can engage in combat with other actors.
HumanoidFigure
A class that implements the new Humanoid Figure actor which the player can sell items to and make money within the game, the actor has the capability buyer and will serve no purpose if the player is not interacting with it Extends the Actor class.

A class that represents puddle.
PurchaseAction
Represents an action where an actor purchases an item from a computer terminal.
PurchaseItemSpecial
An interface representing special behavior for items that can be purchased.
Sapling
A class representing a small tree in the game world.
Sellable
An interface class that creates a new Sellable Item which will easily allow items to be sold in the game
SellableItem
An abstract class that creates a new Sellable Item which will easily allow items to be sold in the game Extends the Item class.
SellAction
A new action that returns the sell method of each sellable item within the game that sell method holds the implementation for the sale process Extends the Action class.
